metadata.title: CVE-2022-48665 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:exfat: fix overflow for large capacity partitionUsing int type for sector index, there will be overflow in a largecapacity partition.For example, if storage with sector size of 512 bytes and partitioncapacity is larger than 2TB, there will be overflow.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
